entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, introduced as 'Harry Potter'. The text describes him as being woken up by cannon-fire and struggling to find his glasses.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, mentioned as hooting happily at Harry from her perch on top of a large wardrobe. The text describes her as taking off through the window to go hunting.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: A person mentioned in the story, introduced as 'Mrs Weasley'. Harry bids her goodnight before getting into bed.

entities.name: harry's school trunk
entities.description: An object mentioned in the story, described as standing amongst unmarked, sealed cardboard boxes. The text describes it as being in the room, which is being used as a temporary warehouse.

entities.name: puking pastille
entities.description: An object mentioned in the story, described as a sticky purple and orange sweet. Harry recognises it as a Puking Pastille.

relationships.description: The text describes Hedwig as being on top of a large wardrobe, and Harry knows she has been waiting to see him before going hunting.
The text describes Harry bidding Mrs Weasley goodnight before getting into bed.
